New Records: Ben Stokes has 90 T20I wickets, the joint most for an Englishman, level with Chris Jordan.
Key Match Events: England chased down 142 in the final over, winning by 4 wickets with 2 balls remaining.
Pathum Nissanka scored 67 off 45, the highest score for Sri Lanka in the match.
Mark Wood took 3 for 26, including 2 wickets in the 20th over, to help restrict Sri Lanka to 141/8.
Ben Stokes scored 42 off 36, including only 2 fours, to guide England to victory.
Dawid Malan injured his groin fielding, and Ben Stokes came in at No. 3 to help stabilize the innings.
